column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////* Royal Lump Crab Cake. Again
column3: there wasn't actually any rating on this dish but when you pay these kinds of prices you expect more. Andy doesn't "get" crab cake. And after this dish I cannot blame her. IMO
column4: you need to have massive chunks of crab jutting out the sides of the crab cake and screaming
column5: "Someone just slapped this together right from a dead cooked crab." It needs to have chunks of crab meat. A crab cake that is pulverized into a patty and served like a hockey puck is fodder of the Jersey shore. Not so good on this front.
